overview: Amy Winehouseâ€™s tremendous soulful vocal talent and songwriting ability established her as one of the most innovative artists of our time. She used the sound of her idols, Etta James & Billie Holiday, to reinvent jazz and blues for a new generation in her album Back To Black, which sold millions of copies worldwide and garnered her countless accolades, including 5 Grammy Awards. This is the story of how in just 27 short years, Amy Winehouse managed to influence the music community, fashion world and a legion of fans that understood her best through her musical genius.
tagline: In Memory Of A Beautiful Voice, Taken Too Soon.
title: Amy Winehouse: Soul Siren (Unauthorised Biography)
